name: Delsa Quest
description:
Delsa is hungry and the only cure is Meat-on-Stick. Unfortunately, he's also broke.

However, a contact of his in the Thieves' Guild let him in on a scoop about a nearby cave full of a treasure. That treasure would buy a lot of meat...

-Controls-
Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
Jump - Z or Spacebar
Attack - X or Left Mouse Button
Enter Doors - Up or W
Escape - View Controls
